name: Finials Bar Stool with Upholstered Seat
description: The Finials Bar Stool with Upholstered, was inspired by the timeless charm of European chair design, reimagined to create a contemporary bar stool. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this bar stool combines beauty, comfort, and functionality to create a stool you can relax on when sharing life's moments at the kitchen counter. The Bar Stool's frame is crafted from solid teakwood, featuring finial details on the stool's back. The vintage-inspired detail adds delicacy to the appearance of the stool designed to add an interesting contrast to a comfortable seat upholstered in an EasyClean linen-look fabric. Handmade in Indonesia by skilled craftsmen.
